com.google.android.exoplayer.text.webvtt

Class WebvttParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.text.webvtt.WebvttParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubtitleParser

    public class WebvttParser
extends Object
implements SubtitleParser
    A simple WebVTT parser.

    See Also:
    WebVTT specification

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EXO_HEADER
      This parser allows a custom header to be prepended to the WebVTT data, in the form of a text line starting with this string.
      static String OFFSET
      A OFFSET + value element can be added to the custom header to specify an offset time (in microseconds) that should be subtracted from the embedded MPEGTS value.

    • Constructor Summary

      WebvttParser() 
      WebvttParser(boolean strictParsing, boolean filterTags)
